1.title: Sumo Momo
1.plot: Samosa is excited to go to a wrestling competition with his friends because it features his favorite wrestler, Sumo Momo. He gets very nervous, however, when he finds that he's the challenger facing Sumo Momo.

2.title: Chutney Dam
2.plot: Samosa, Dhokla, Jalebi, and Vada spend a day relaxing near the Chutney Dam, where the lakes are made of green chutney instead of water. When they set up a diving competition there, Dhokla tries to jump into the lake and absorbs all of the chutney, leading the townspeople to believe that Samosa and his friends are chutney thieves.

3.title: Makhi Makhi
3.plot: The mayor of Chatpata Nagar imprisons a fly and warns the townspeople of the dangers of such insects. When the fly escapes its prison, it gets stuck on the swirl on Jalebi's head, and Samosa, Dhokla, and Vada must get her to the hospital to have it removed.

4.title: Dadi Ke Saath
4.plot: Samosa goes to visit his grandma at her house and brings his friends along. After his grandma tells the four a scary story about chewed-up foods hiding in the forest, Samosa goes outside to find some coriander for his grandma to cook with and discovers her story is true.

5.title: Spa Wars
5.plot: Samosa and his friends investigate Appa Spa, a futuristic, hi-tech spa opened by Iddiyappam Appa right across the street from Chatpata Nagar's most popular spa, Amma Spa, run by Iddiyappam Amma.

6.title: Meethi Masi
6.plot: Samosa's aunt Sweetyhearty drops by to visit his house and brings a few of his younger cousins with her. The cousins end up annoying Samosa so much that he decides to come up with a plan to get them to leave his house.

7.title: Tutti Frutti
7.plot: Tutti Frutti, the daughter of Mayor Royal Falooda, decides to run away from home to get away from her father's constant annoying questions. Samosa and Vada help a grieving Mayor by going out to look for Tutti Frutti for him.

8.title: Cupcake Gang
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Carnival Chaos
9.plot: Samosa and his friends go to the carnival and have fun on the rides when Vada discovers a secret ride and is told that he'll become the king of the carnival if he makes it through the ride. Samosa goes into the ride to help him out.

10.title: Maa Mooli
10.plot: Dhokla wakes up one morning to find that he has been hit with a streak of bad luck. When this bad luck gets him hurt, Samosa and friends are directed to the Maa Mooli, who can take care of bad luck-related problems.

11.title: Jalebi's Birthday
11.plot: It's Jalebi's birthday, and she's expecting her friends Samosa, Dhokla, and Vada to wish her a happy birthday. They refuse to acknowledge her birthday when they ask her for help doing various trivial tasks, however, which gets her wondering if they've forgotten.

12.title: Frankie Dayaloo
12.plot: Samosa and friends are excited that the actor Frankie Dayaloo is coming to Chatpata Nagar. Unfortunately, he stages a protest on a hotel roof that gets everyone tensed up.

13.title: Cultural Programme
13.plot: Samosa, Jalebi, and Dhokla think that Vada's violin playing is absolutely horrible and make an effort to prevent him from going to the Cultural Programme so that others won't have to hear his horrible music.

14.title: Chote Rajaji
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Anda Bhatija
15.plot: A fried egg alien finds its way to Chatpata Nagar. Samosa and his friends are scared of it at first, but Samosa eventually makes friends with it and names it Yolky. Samosa and his friends must defend the innocent Yolky when the military is informed of his presence in Chatpata Nagar.

16.title: Doctor D
16.plot: Dhokla is going on his first trip abroad. When he finally makes it to his destination, he comments about it on social media so much that Samosa, Jalebi, and Vada block him to keep him from annoying them. When he finally comes back home, Dhokla has become a celebrity named Doctor D who ignores Samosa and his friends.

17.title: Sollid Survival
17.plot: Samosa appears as a contestant on a reality TV show titled "Sollid Survival", where he must face some tough opponents and obstacles out in the wild.

18.title: Shakti Samosa
18.plot: Samosa decides to spend a day exercising at the gymnasium.

19.title: Comic Book
19.plot: Jalebi writes a story about Samosa, and Vada and Dhokla decide to jump in and add their own ideas to the story.

20.title: Cricket Match
20.plot: Samosa is named the umpire of the Ghee-Twenty Cricket League and is surprised to find out that his friends Dhokla, Jalebi, and Vada are playing in the match as well.

21.title: Jaa One
21.plot: The gang spends the weekend hanging out at Vada's beach house. Samosa convinces his friends to follow him on an adventure under the sea.

22.title: Tufaan
22.plot: Samosa orders a cycle, the Storm 5000, in the mail. When it arrives, he has a lot of fun riding it around Chatpata Nagar. When he runs into several townsfolk who need help doing something, he asks them to do it themselves as he is too busy riding his cycle to bother with them.

23.title: Hair Today Gone Tomorrow
23.plot: Samosa and friends help Dhokla to look for a cure when he suddenly starts to suffer hair loss.

24.title: Sabse Sweetest Kaun?
24.plot: In the kingdom of Chatpata Nagar, King Royal Falooda gets angry when he discovers that Dhokla is considered the sweetest in all the land.

29.title: Samosa Mama
29.plot: Cham Cham thinks he's finally showed Samosa what for - he's blamed a kidnapping on him and gotten him sent to court. Jalebi, Dhokla, and Vada arrive on the scene to prove Samosa's innocence before he gets wrongfully punished.

30.title: Banana Fontana
30.plot:

31.title: Pimple Samosa
31.plot: Samosa is getting ready for the day when he suddenly develops a pimple on his cheek. The pimple turns out to be alive and claims he is actually a pea named Peter. Samosa finds Peter annoying and tries to get rid of him.

imdb.title: Simple Samosa
plot: Samosa, a vibrant and energetic hero, is ready for any challenges in life and also steps up to solve any issue in order to seize the day.
